title: Will everyones r*nk change??
content: The mail the university sent says the portal will reopen for ppl who didnt upload their J33 r*nk. So does this mean the r*nklist is gon change and everybody is gon get new r*nk? (The words J33 and r*nk are banned here apparently)

comments.body: Shouldn't ig??
If new ppl get added to the ranklist wont everyones rank change??
I think it has been opened for those who had already registered till 21 but couldn't upload jee ranks ..also I don't think they will go through the trouble of publishing/ alloting new ranks
The mail says they will be allotted pesu rank card

for the love of god ask college directly or read the website properly   
Some fool will give wrong answer and u might make poor decisions with that info.
Then who know s??ðŸ¤·
Not it wont change... Dis is the final rank list is what I think.. They might have a separate rank list coz as mentioned yesterday's was the final list
I asked them theyre saying we're just employees we dont know itsupto the management

They messed up my rank and another one too 
The site had a glitch

They told us to edit it I don't know about rank card

They give the ranklist based on what u typed in crl rank only no verification 

I don't know how they changed my CRL I was so sure I wrote the correct one and this happened with the op too they said to update it
Wait till u know they don't even pick up calls and respond to mails ðŸ˜‚
Did it get resolved ?? Or will they really reallot ranks??

No the new rank list is not out I made a post in the sub , they don't pick up calls and respond to mails

I don't know how they changed my rank I was supposed to get a rank of 1.5k but got 3k because of that glitch

I updated the rank today as the portal was open to update the rank and reuploaded my jee scorecard now I don't know what they will do
The portal hasnt reopened yet , i m waiting to upload since morning
idk if they are high or what, who system of admssion seems fcked up!!!

Interesting, they do tend to answer properly.
Just wait and watch ig.
Pessat counselling was soo smooth last time, they fucked smth up this year.
Yea man fr seems unprofessional ash. They messed up my jee main crl too
Ig they dk how to do it w jee main rank
They messed up jee main crl and i was able to correct it earlier (dk if theyll mess it up again)
But that doesn't mean *we* know the answer. Please understand that this is the first time this system has been introduced. Everybody is new to it.
They will prolly sort it out soon, just be patient.
Bro please check my recent post
